channel.title: J. P. McGarry on Artur L Gower
channel.description: Recent content in J. P. McGarry on Artur L Gower

item.title: A robust anisotropic hyperelastic formulation for the modelling of soft tissue
item.description: Contour plots illustrating the stresses computed for the standard arterial wall model (HGO-C) and our modified model (MA) after stent deployment. A) von Mises stress q, B) pressure stress -σ hyd, C) triaxiality, D) ratio of axial stress to the circumferential stress σ_zz /σ_θθ.
